oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #005
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #5, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers, Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- I Couldn't Believe It Was True (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- You Only Want Me When You're Lonely (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold introduce the Willis Brothers -- Blue Tail Fly (Willis Brothers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Raggedy Ann (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold talk -- Who At My Door Is Standing (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hal Horton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Willis, Skeeter, -1976
